title: [Large-Scale] Mobile Microlearning for Diagnosing and Improving Learners' Misconceptions in Qualitative Research Processes

context.additional_context: Operating a feedback system centered on asynchronous learning and formative assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and correct at least three methodological misconceptions arising during qualitative research design processes.
Learners can diagnose potential errors in research designs by analyzing collected data using NVivo software.
Learners can correct at least two conceptual misunderstandings identified in peers' qualitative research proposals through peer review.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
